attributes.action: Relax school uniforms as long as colour matches it should be ok
attributes.additional_details: Because I believe children are the future and should be able to make simply decision on what to wear to feel more comftable as long as it not revealing
attributes.background: Children should be able to choose what feels more comftable at school as long as colour goes with the school uniform as comfy children will learn more because certain pieces of clothing don't make your brain work better and uniforms are about same price as designer clothing

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about school uniform polices are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban compulsory school uniforms: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639304
